SEARCH
Package com.project.moviebooking.service

Interface UserService

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserServiceImpl
public interface UserService
Service interface responsible for user-related operations in the movie booking system. Provides methods for user creation, login, verification, token handling, and password management.

  • Method Details

    • createUser

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationResponse> createUser(UserRequest userRequest)
      Creates a new user based on the provided user details.
      Parameters:
      userRequest - The request containing details to create a user.
      Returns:
      The response entity with authentication details for the created user.

    • login

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationResponse> login(AuthenticationRequest request)
      Authenticates a user based on the provided credentials.
      Parameters:
      request - The authentication request containing user credentials.
      Returns:
      The response entity with authentication details upon successful login.

    • verifyUser

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationResponse> verifyUser(String emailId, String otp)
      Verifies a user based on the provided email ID and OTP.
      Parameters:
      emailId - The email ID of the user to be verified.
      otp - The one-time password for user verification.
      Returns:
      The response entity with authentication details upon successful user verification.

    • refreshToken

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationResponse> refreshToken(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Refreshes the authentication token for a user.
      Parameters:
      request - The HTTP servlet request.
      response - The HTTP servlet response.
      Returns:
      The response entity with a refreshed authentication token.

    • forgotPassword

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationResponse> forgotPassword(String emailId)
      Initiates the password reset process for a user based on the provided email ID.
      Parameters:
      emailId - The email ID for which password reset is requested.
      Returns:
      The response entity with details regarding the password reset process.

    • verifyForgetPassword

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationResponse> verifyForgetPassword(String emailId, String otp, String password)
      Verifies the password reset request using the provided email ID, OTP, and new password.
      Parameters:
      emailId - The email ID for which password reset is requested.
      otp - The one-time password for password reset verification.
      password - The new password for the user account.
      Returns:
      The response entity confirming successful password reset.

    • sendOtpAgain

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthenticationResponse> sendOtpAgain(String emailId)
      Sends an OTP again for a specific email ID as part of the forget password process.
      Parameters:
      emailId - The email ID for which OTP resend is requested.
      Returns:
      The response entity with details regarding the OTP resend process.
